name: IQ of a Field Mouse
description:
Aim of the game:

The Farmer hates mice eating all his corn but that's not going to stop Mousy. Collect the chickens to annoy the Farmer then once he is lured out of his comfy farmers home, hit his tractor 5 times to send him flying!

Each level gets slightly harder, watch out for his dog. He's a fast little scamp! Destroy the dog house on the level

To unlock the bonus stage which is a blissful level filled with corny goodness.

The game has random levels generated by the five second count down and unique music per stage.

The game Engine allows many options to customise the difficulty and level objects.

I.Q. of a Field Mouse has two modes of play:

- Normal (Which is story mode without the story)

- Survival Mode (Survive wave after wave of famer dogs)

Enjoy!


Developer Notes:

This was my first commercial game I made which I had a publisher for, but for whatever reasons the publisher

Went under and I was stuck with a game I made which took over 5 months to develop with no interest to promote myself.

So Now I give it to you, the good people of the internet for free.

But you can donate to labonline@ymail.com via paypal or on my itch.io page http://corrosive-python.itch.io/
